definition: ultimately/in the final analysis/after all/when all is said and done

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: But fiscal stimulus by definition is temporary.
sentences.chinese: 然而財政刺激歸根結蒂只是暫時性的。

sentences.english: In the fInal analysis, the strength In russia was on the side of the Soviets of Workers, Peasants and Soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結蒂，俄國的力量是在工農兵蘇維埃這方面。

sentences.english: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself. (Jean Bnouilh)
sentences.chinese: 歸根結蒂，愛情是你本身的天賦。

sentences.english: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself. (Jean Anouilh)
sentences.chinese: 歸根結蒂，一愛一情是你自己的天賦。

sentences.english: That is to say, in the last analysis, it serves the economic base .
sentences.chinese: 這就是說，歸根結蒂，它是爲經濟基礎服務的。

sentences.english: In a word, it is a matter of the construction of the library legal system.
sentences.chinese: 但歸根結蒂，是圖書館的法制建設問題。

sentences.english: So he can be in love, after all.
sentences.chinese: 所以，歸根結蒂，他可能是在戀愛了。

sentences.english: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself. (Jean Anouilh)
sentences.chinese: 歸根結蒂，是自身的天賦。
